verses.text: The \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of the \w Preacher|strong="H6953"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w king|strong="H4428"\w* in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

\w Vanity|strong="H1892"\w* of \w vanities|strong="H1892"\w*, \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Preacher|strong="H6953"\w*, \w vanity|strong="H1892"\w* of \w vanities|strong="H1892"\w*; all \add is\add* \w vanity|strong="H1892"\w*.
What \w profit|strong="H3504"\w* hath a \w man|strong="H0120"\w* of all his \w labour|strong="H5999"\w* which he \w taketh|strong="H5998"\w* under the \w sun|strong="H8121"\w*?

\add One\add* \w generation|strong="H1755"\w* passeth \w away|strong="H1980"\w*, and \add another\add* \w generation|strong="H1755"\w* \w cometh|strong="H0935"\w*: but the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \w abideth|strong="H5975"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.

The \w sun|strong="H8121"\w* also \w ariseth|strong="H2224"\w*, and the \w sun|strong="H8121"\w* goeth \w down|strong="H0935"\w*, and \w hasteth|strong="H7602"\w* to his \w place|strong="H4725"\w* where he \w arose|strong="H2224"\w*.\f + \fr 1.5 \ft hasteth: Heb. panteth\f*

The \w wind|strong="H7307"\w* \w goeth|strong="H1980"\w* toward the \w south|strong="H1864"\w*, and turneth \w about|strong="H5437"\w* unto the \w north|strong="H6828"\w*; it whirleth about \w continually|strong="H1980"\w*, and the \w wind|strong="H7307"\w* returneth \w again|strong="H7725"\w* according to his \w circuits|strong="H5439"\w*.

All the \w rivers|strong="H5158"\w* \w run|strong="H1980"\w* into the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*; yet the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* \add is\add* not \w full|strong="H4392"\w*; unto the \w place|strong="H4725"\w* from whence the \w rivers|strong="H5158"\w* \w come|strong="H1980"\w*, thither they \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w again|strong="H3212"\w*.\f + \fr 1.7 \ft return…: Heb. return to go\f*

All \w things|strong="H1697"\w* \add are\add* full of \w labour|strong="H3023"\w*; \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w cannot|strong="H3201"\w* \w utter|strong="H1696"\w* \add it:\add* the \w eye|strong="H5869"\w* is not \w satisfied|strong="H7646"\w* with \w seeing|strong="H7200"\w*, nor the \w ear|strong="H0241"\w* \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* with \w hearing|strong="H8085"\w*.

The thing that hath been, it \add is that\add* which shall be; and that which is \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \add is\add* that which shall be \w done|strong="H6213"\w*: and \add there is\add* no \w new|strong="H2319"\w* \add thing\add* under the \w sun|strong="H8121"\w*.

Is \w there|strong="H3426"\w* \add any\add* \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* whereof it may be \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w See|strong="H7200"\w*, this \add is\add* \w new|strong="H2319"\w*? it hath been \w already|strong="H3528"\w* of old \w time|strong="H5769"\w*, which was \w before|strong="H6440"\w* us.

\add There is\add* no \w remembrance|strong="H2146"\w* of \w former|strong="H7223"\w* \add things;\add* neither shall there be \add any\add* \w remembrance|strong="H2146"\w* of \add things\add* that are to \w come|strong="H0314"\w* with \add those\add* that shall come \w after|strong="H0314"\w*.
¶ I the \w Preacher|strong="H6953"\w* was \w king|strong="H4428"\w* over \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

And I \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* my \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* to \w seek|strong="H1875"\w* and search \w out|strong="H8446"\w* by \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w* concerning all \add things\add* that are \w done|strong="H6213"\w* under \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*: this \w sore|strong="H7451"\w* \w travail|strong="H6045"\w* hath \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* to the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w* to be \w exercised|strong="H6031"\w* therewith.\f + \fr 1.13 \ft to be…: or, to afflict them\f*

I have \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* all the \w works|strong="H4639"\w* that are \w done|strong="H6213"\w* under the \w sun|strong="H8121"\w*; and, behold, all \add is\add* \w vanity|strong="H1892"\w* and \w vexation|strong="H7469"\w* of \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w*.

\add That which is\add* \w crooked|strong="H5791"\w* \w cannot|strong="H3201"\w* be made \w straight|strong="H8626"\w*: and that which is \w wanting|strong="H2642"\w* \w cannot|strong="H3201"\w* be \w numbered|strong="H4487"\w*.\f + \fr 1.15 \ft that which is wanting: Heb. defect\f*

I \w communed|strong="H1696"\w* with mine own \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Lo, I am come to great \w estate|strong="H1431"\w*, and have \w gotten|strong="H3254"\w* more \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w* than all \add they\add* that have been \w before|strong="H6440"\w* me in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*: yea, my \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* had \w great|strong="H7235"\w* \w experience|strong="H7200"\w* of \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w* and \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w*.\f + \fr 1.16 \ft had…: Heb. had seen much\f*

And I \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* my \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* to \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w*, and to \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w madness|strong="H1947"\w* and \w folly|strong="H5531"\w*: I \w perceived|strong="H3045"\w* that \w this|strong="H1571"\w* also is \w vexation|strong="H7475"\w* of \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w*.

For in \w much|strong="H7230"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w* \add is\add* \w much|strong="H7230"\w* \w grief|strong="H3708"\w*: and he that \w increaseth|strong="H3254"\w* \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w* \w increaseth|strong="H3254"\w* \w sorrow|strong="H4341"\w*.
